title: Controlled synthesis of copper sulfide-based catalysts for electrochemical reduction of CO2 to formic acid and beyond: a review
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00302K, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anirban Mukherjee, Maryam Abdinejad, Susanta Sinha Mahapatra, Bidhan Chandra Ruidas
This review provides a comprehensive overview of various advanced engineering strategies and controlled synthesis of copper–sulfide compounds for enhanced electrochemical CO2 reduction to valuable products.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
